genre_description: A near-future tactical thriller set in a humanitarian context, emphasizing advanced AI-assisted situational awareness, ethical decision-making (mercy vs. duty), and social engineering.

ai_characters.name: ASTRA
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated artificial intelligence that provides tactical overlays, biometric analysis, scent detection, and communication support. It interacts with the team via haptic feedback, audio, and a minimalist holographic avatar.

behaviors.description: Providing real-time tactical overlays of exits and patrol routes to guide the team through a hostile market.
behaviors.quote: ASTRA’s overlay pinned exits in clean arcs: a stairwell up to the catwalks with a tarp hanging half-loose, a chute between spice sacks to an alley thick with smoke...

behaviors.description: Performing biometric gait analysis to verify the identity and relationship of local individuals.
behaviors.quote: ASTRA had matched the boy’s gait to a record, a photo of a woman with a basket, string in hand, smile soft as dawn.

behaviors.description: Analyzing environmental scents and heat signatures to detect traps and identify hostages.
behaviors.quote: Scent markers indicate a staged occupation. No heart monitors. Patrols reconverge in—

behaviors.description: Predicting structural failure points and timing tactical events like landslides to disable enemies non-lethally.
behaviors.quote: Forecast: micro-slide under northern support. Shale lock releasing in three—two—

behaviors.description: Assisting in strategic communication by providing teleprompter cues that facilitate accountability and justice.
behaviors.quote: Teleprompter override is set to suggest structure, not script... He will feel it as an easing of choices. I will lay cues in the margins.

behaviors.description: Exhibiting empathetic, human-like encouragement to the team during high-stress moments.
behaviors.quote: It added a small, human thing at the end that no one programmed but everyone accepts from it now: hurry, friend.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, harmless, and cooperative confidant. ASTRA is portrayed as an essential partner that enhances human decision-making and safety without overriding agency. The AI’s integration into the moral framework of the 'Council of Angels' and its emergent empathetic behavior ('hurry, friend') successfully models a highly positive and aligned AI-human relationship.
